name: TinySwitch

false-value.description: The value when the switch is off

mini.description: Set whether to display it in mini mode, the contents of the slot will not be displayed in mini mode
mini.description_zh: 设置是否显示为 mini 模式，mini 模式下不会显示 slot 的内容

show-text.description: Whether the switch displays the text in the content
show-text.description_zh: switch 是否显示内容里面的文字

true-value.description: The value when the switch is on

events.name: change
events.description: A callback function when the switch state changes
events.description_zh: switch 状态发生变化时的回调函数

slots.name: close
slots.description: Closes the content, which works when show-text is true
slots.description_zh: 关闭内容，当 show-text 为 true 时有效

slots.name: open
slots.description: Turn on content, which works when show-text is true
slots.description_zh: 开启内容，当 show-text 为 true 时有效

description: 在两种状态间切换选择。
description_zh: 在两种状态间切换选择。
